scripts.build: node-sass --omit-source-map-url --include-path node_modules static/sass --output-style compressed --output static/css && postcss --no-map --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css' && yarn run build-js
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules static/sass --output static/css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css static/css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle
scripts.lint-python: flake8 webapp tests && black --check --line-length 79 tests webapp
scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-python && yarn run test-python
